title: Basic Settings
intro: This sample page provides information to configure the basic items on your page.
dateModifiedIntro: The date modified is displayed near the bottom of the page, above the footer.
screenIdentifierIntro: The screen identifier is displayed near the bottom of the page, above the footer.
versionIdentifierIntro: The version identifier is displayed near the bottom of the page, above the footer.
instructions: It can be configured as a prop passed to the DefaultTemplate or AppTemplate component.
